presentation.title: Practice for your next job interview!
presentation.message:
Does taking job interviews get you nervous and anxious?
Maybe you still feel unprepared to take job interviews?
This is the perfect app to practice your conversational skills in a job interview setting!

presentation.title: Be prepared for your next job!
presentation.message: Job Intelliviewer uses the power of artificial intelligence to conduct realistic mock job interviews to help you harness the conversational skills needed to make a good impression on real life recruiters and make you prepared to ace your next real life interview.

presentation.title: Premium subscription:
presentation.message: Receive a report at the end of each interview summarizing the conversation with feedback and advice on how to improve your chances of getting hired in a real job interview.

cooldown.description:
The free version of the app allows you to take one interview per hour.

If you'd like to remove the limitations, remove the ads, and receive a feedback report with advice on how to improve after each interview, consider subscribing to PREMIUM.
cooldown.active:
Wait for the cooldown timer before generating a new interview.

If you'd like to remove cooldowns, remove ads, and receive a feedback report with advice on how to improve after each interview, consider subscribing to PREMIUM.

store.short_description: Practice for your next job interview with this realistic AI simulator
store.full_description:
Does taking job interviews get you nervous and anxious?
Maybe you still feel unprepared to take job interviews?
This is the perfect app to practice your conversational skills in a job interview setting!

Job Intelliviewer uses the power of artificial intelligence to conduct realistic mock job interviews to help you harness the conversational skills needed to make a good impression on real life recruiters and make you prepared to ace your next interview.

The interviews are tailored to the job position you're seeking, and will be shaped and adjusted with questions related to your goals to better represent a real job interview.

Premium users will also receive a report at the end of each interview summarizing the conversation with feedback and advice on how to improve your chances of getting hired in a real job interview.
taglines: Be prepared for your next job!
Practice for your next job interview!
Ace your next job interview with AI!
Your next professional success awaits you here!
premium_benefits: Receive reports with feedback and advice
Receive reports with feedback and advice after interviews
